nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Sub-workflow: Return the capitals of fictional countries
It can either list the countries it knows about or return the capital of a specific country

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Return country list
nodes.notes: This set node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Return specific capital
nodes.notes: This set node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Tool to call the workflow below

parameters.name: country_capitals_tool
parameters.description:
This tool has two modes:
1. Pass 'list' to the tool to get a list of countries that the tool has the capitals for (one per line). This is useful if you can't find a match, to see if the country being asked about might have been misspelled.
2. Pass one of the country names in the list to the tool to get the capital of that country. Note that the country must be spelled exactly as it is in the list of countries returned in mode 1

nodes.notes: This toolWorkflow node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

Click the 'Chat' button at the bottom of the screen to try

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# OpenAI Assistant with custom n8n tools

## Overview
Automated workflow: OpenAI Assistant with custom n8n tools. This workflow integrates 12 different services: stickyNote, openAiAssistant, code, merge, summarize. It contains 15 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 15
- **Node Types**: 12
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **On new manual Chat Message**: manualChatTrigger
- **OpenAI Assistant**: openAiAssistant
- **Execute Workflow Trigger**: executeWorkflowTrigger
- **Mapping data**: code
- **List countries?**: if
- **Mapping data1**: code
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Return country list**: set
- **Return specific capital**: set
- **Tool to call the workflow below**: toolWorkflow
- ... and 5 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.
